sub_title: Vice President Organization Development  - Talks about #Strategy Execution #Orchestrating Change #Operating Model & Org Design # Dual Career with kids
summary:
Executive with significant international experience in designing and implementing large and complex business transformations and change interventions at global, regional and local levels.  A leader and trusted business advisor with a unique ability to leverage a broad set of skills and experiences across many different cultures and industries. Characterized by a track record of delivering real business value and an ability to operate at a small as well as very large scale impacting the individual, team and organizational level.

Skills 
- Leading Large and Complex Change
- Executive Leadership (Team) Effectiveness 
- Learning Program Design and Deployment 
- Large Scale Organizational Operating Model Design & Deployment
- Leader with a total community > 100+
- Worked and lived in UK, USA, IT, NL
- Worked across Trading and Supply, Project & Technology, Downstream, Midstream, Biochemicals, Pharmaceutical, IT , Tank storage and Transportation
- Direct accountability for serving customers

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the delivery of Organizational Development diagnosis and solutions for strategic organizational projects to drive Shell's Power Progress purpose and strategy.  Team of 40 senior consultants working across Shell, including a wider ecosystem with external consultants.
profile_positions.title: Vice President Organizational Development Consulting

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the strategic direction of the integrated capability development and orchestrating the integrated strategic change agenda (incl. digital) in Trading and Supply a large multi Bln global business with > 7000 employees. Direct supervision of 24 staff and a $8 Mln budget.

Driving alignment of the executive and extended Leadership Teams (~Top 150 in T&S) around the implementation of the newly developed Ambition and Foundations, improving executive team effectiveness and cross business collaboration leading to more integrated value for Shell.

Developing a new approach to assess and improve the organisational capabilities that are needed to excel and win against competitors creating a more focused and integrated agenda for Learning, Process Excellence and IT 

Tracking and delivering current Learning delivery (70-20-10) and competence assurance. Whilst at the same time seeking opportunities to enhance learning with new competencies (in power/biofuels/digital/deal development) and reducing time to autonomy using digital tools
profile_positions.title: Global Manager Organizational Development & Learning, Shell Trading and Supply

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the design and delivery of organisational, team and leadership development interventions. Direct supervision of 5 consultants and a $3 Mln budget. 

Played a key role in the first phase of the BG/Shell Merger. Led the design and delivery of a Leadership mobilization strategy and plan for Executive Committee and Executive Vice Presidents resulting in clear ownership by BG/Shell Leaders (~200 Most Senior Executives).

Designed and delivered an extensive onboarding program for BG new joiners to Shell making them feel welcome and informed as well as off boarding of former BG staff leaving Shell. (~ 2.500 impacted staff) 

Co-leading the design and delivery of several Executive Leadership Development Sessions (Senior Executive Forum & PU reviewers, Top 20 Executive Leaders in Shell) to enable roll out of the new Shell purpose, revised strategy and leadership behaviours to drive high performance.
profile_positions.title: Europe/RoW Organizational Effectiveness Manager, Shell Group

profile_positions.description:
Led the implementation of new cross business organisational structures (Trading, Manufacturing and Retail) and ways of working resulting in extensive new value generation (~2000 impacted staff). Activities included Learning Programs, Employee Engagement, Staff Impact and Leadership mobilization. 

Coached the Shell Pipeline Executive Vice President Team ($ 500 Mln business) to instil a continuous improvement culture resulting in more ownership and buy in of the strategic business agenda. 

Coached several Chemicals Executives to increase competitiveness of delivery of large capital projects resulting in improved decision quality.
profile_positions.title: Senior Organizational Development Consultant, Downstream

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for leading the HR/People Business Readiness agenda to design and implement the Global SAP Program for the US Fuels Businesses. This was a true largescale business transformation impacting more than 15.000 end users, 100 Senior leaders, 500 front line leaders, 450 Super users, and 250 trainers across several Businesses.
 
The program covered a large and geographically dispersed business, unique requirements and business models, joint venture partners and Offshore Service Centres. Direct supervision of 45 staff and extended HR and Change Implementation teams in the business, onshore and offshore of 150 people and a $15 Mln budget.

HR/People Readiness agenda which was core to the Programme’s success and resulted in the biggest and most successful global Go Live. These activities included design and implementation of Learning and Capability building programs for Leaders, End users and Super users as well as Organisational Design, Workforce Impact, Talent & Performance Management, Leadership Team development Interventions, Employee Engagement, Leadership Coaching at Executive and Vice President Level.
profile_positions.title: HR/Change & Engage Leader, Shell Downstream

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for identifying, resourcing and delivering of organisational and change management interventions to enable the Project and Technology businesses to flawlessly execute large and complex capital investment projects, create and realize competitive advantage and more effectively deliver technical excellence.

Led the design and the delivery of the HR / Change Management agenda for a large global location office footprint review resulting in a revised organisational structure and optimized footprint around three technology hubs. (~2.000 impacted staff in USA, NL, Germany, UK, KL and Bangalore, working through HR and change implementation teams ~ 50 staff). 

Designed and the delivered several Extended Leadership Team Interventions (~150 Executives).
profile_positions.title: Organizational Effectiveness Consultant, Shell Project and Technology

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for an efficient and effective support to implement and design the methodology for the Global SAP implementation. Consisting of Change Competence building model and assessment for Senior, Midlevel and frontline leaders, Learning and Training programs, Employee Engagement, Organisational Design, Change and Staff Impact, 

Set up of large change programs in countries including the resourcing model and clear governance structures. Led the extended Change Teams and networks in several countries. Delivered and ensured an extensive on-boarding and training programs for change teams and monitored delivery of change activities and key milestones according to plan. 

Led the design and delivery of a Change Competence Model including Senior Leadership assessments and capability programs to equip senior leaders with right skills to manage large complex change programs
profile_positions.title: Global Change and Integration Manager Downstream Europe & Americas

profile_positions.description: Accountable for setting up and running my own business focused on Change Implementation. Designed and developed Change Management approaches, programs and interventions for clients. Mainly working for international leading firms such as DSM.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director of Change That Works

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing large IT projects from conception through to delivery ( waterfall and prototype development approach). 

Direct supervision of a client focus team of 30 people varying from strategists, creative, technical, account managers and project managers
profile_positions.title: Director Project Management

profile_positions.description:
Optimized the supply portfolio and supply costs. Re-negotiated LPG contracts with the suppliers and transporters. 

Set up and carried out a big project on process mapping of the current processes and the development of the business case to implement a SAP system at a Southern European level. 

Contemporarily managed and implemented 12 projects for current systems. Direct supervision of 4 staff. Budget of $1 Mln.
profile_positions.title: Supply Economist & Project Manager IT

profile_positions.description: As a Business Development Manager designed and conducted an in-depth market and Competitor analysis and field research in South America. As an Account Manager Managed day-to-day logistic processes for several large international clients
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager & Account Manager

volunteer_experiences.role: Chair of the Dutch Board - NTC
